2007-03-19

A Head Full of Wishes spreads to last.fm and flickr

A Head Full of Wishes (the web site) has spread it's wings and now also exists as...



A Head Full of Wishes (the last.fm group)



and



A Head Full of Wishes (the Flickr group)



So there's new places to satisfy obsession with Galaxie 500, Luna, Damon & Naomi, Britta Phillips & Dean Wareham and anything else related...
